elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which types of behavior constitute good cause for terminating the employment relationship without notice? Discuss this question with your colleagues.
choices: Theft to the detriment of the employer.
Embezzlement to the detriment of a third party.
Repeated private conversations among the staff.
Unauthorized visit to the cinema during business hours.
correctAnswer: Theft to the detriment of the employer.
